projects.title: DeeGee Furniture Website (Demo)
projects.description: A clean, mobile-friendly demo for a furniture brand. Features product categories, direct WhatsApp ordering, and a simple, fast UI.

projects.title: MacDee RTW Website (Demo)
projects.description: A sleek fashion brand demo site for ready-to-wear pieces. Includes product galleries, WhatsApp ordering, and a smooth, mobile-first design.
